name: Finding The Jewel Tree
description:
This is a 2D platformer made with Knytt Stories.

Premise: 

According to the tale, there is a kind of tree with white leave that can bear gems, which is called the Jewel Trees. Anyone who finds them will gain inexhaustible wealth. so you go on a journey of finding the Jewel Trees.

GamePlay:

In this adventure, players will be able to explore more than 15 scenes, three different big environments, encounter dangerous water zone, dark monsters, and interesting puzzles. 

The wonderful adventures and the truth of the jewel tree is waiting for you.

Control Tips:  

  •  move left or right: left and right arrow key
  • climb wall: up arrow key 
  • touch saving point: down arrow key
  •  jump: S key (also double S for double jump)
  • use invisibility power:  W key
